Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/29th
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 29th, State, 31st and Michigan: due to, police activity near Michigan/29th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 29th, State, 31st, Michigan and over regular route due to police activity near Michigan/29th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
